info.title: MobilePacketCoreManagementClient
info.description: The definitions in this swagger specification will be used for Mobile Packet Core Routing resource

put.description: Creates or updates a Mobile Packet Core Routing

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update a Routing object

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about the specified Mobile Packet Core Routing resource

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Mobile Packet Core Routing object.

parameters.name: routingName
parameters.description: The name of the routing object

200.description: Successful: The routing object has been deleted

204.description: Successful: The routing object does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the Routing resources in a mobile packet core.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of Routing resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

PrefixGeLeRangeIpv4.description: lessThanOrEqual/greaterThanOrEqual range type for IpV4 address

PrefixGeLeRangeIpv6.description: lessThanOrEqual/greaterThanOrEqual range type for IpV6 address

Redistribute.description: Protocol type to redistribute into BGP

localAs.description: Autonomous System Number for this BGP router

routerId.description: Parameters for deriving a local router ID

useInterfaceIp.description: Use an IPv4 address from a local interface as the router ID

idRange.description: If useInterfaceIp is false, allocate the router ID from this range

allocations.description: Values allocated from the start/end range

gracefulRestart.description: Configuration of BGP Graceful Restart Timers.  Enabled if present, disabled if omitted

neighbors.description: Manage ipv4 unicast address family features on a neighbor peering

remoteAddress.description: IP address of neighbor.  Should match an entry in BGP neighbors array

nextHopSelf.description: Set router as next-hop for all routes advertised to peer

capabilities.description: Configure the capabilities of this neighbor

routeMap.description: Apply route-map filtering to in(bound) and/or out(bound) update messages carried by this peering

routeMapName.description: Name of route map under the policy group

redistribute.description: Protocol type to redistribute into BGP

neighbors.description: Manage ipv6 unicast address family features on a neighbor peering

remoteAddress.description: IP address of neighbor.  Should match an entry in BGP neighbors array

nextHopSelf.description: Set router as next-hop for all routes advertised to peer

capabilities.description: Configure the capabilities of this neighbor

routeMap.description: Apply route-map filtering to in(bound) and/or out(bound) update messages carried by this peering

routeMapName.description: Name of route map under the policy group

redistribute.description: Protocol type to redistribute into BGP

neighbors.description: Manage vpn-v4 unicast address family features on a neighbor peering

remoteAddress.description: IP address of neighbor.  Should match an entry in BGP neighbors array

nextHopSelf.description: Set router as next-hop for all routes advertised to peer

capabilities.description: Configure the capabilities of this neighbor

routeMap.description: Apply route-map filtering to in(bound) and/or out(bound) update messages carried by this peering

routeMapName.description: Name of route map under the policy group

sendCommunity.description: Configure type of community support - standard, extended or both.

neighbors.description: Manage vpn-v6 unicast address family features on a neighbor peering.

remoteAddress.description: IP address of neighbor.  Should match an entry in BGP neighbors array

nextHopSelf.description: Set router as next-hop for all routes advertised to peer

capabilities.description: Configure the capabilities of this neighbor

routeMap.description: Apply route-map filtering to in(bound) and/or out(bound) update messages carried by this peering

routeMapName.description: Name of route map under the policy group

sendCommunity.description: Configure type of community support - standard, extended or both.

virtualRoutingFunction.description: Configure and manage Virtual Routing Functions

nextHopSelf.description: Set router as next-hop for all routes advertised to peer

networkContextName.description: Network Context name - type is <alphanumeric, '_' is allowed>.  Is the name of a network context with vrf = true

routeDistinguisher.description: Route Distinguisher - '<ASN>:<nn>' or '<ipv4-addr>:<nn>'. Cannot be modified once VRF has been created

importMap.description: Route map to filter routes imported into VRF. Applied after import route targets.(Needs hard clear of bgp sessions to take effect)

routeMapName.description: Name of route map filter under the policy group

routeTargetImport.description: Ignore Route Target Import and exclusively use Import-Map to filter routes

mplsExp.description: MPLS experimental bits value to be carried in this VRF for both IPv4 & IPv6 traffic. Reset BGP Peering to take this value in effect
MPLS experimental bits value to be carried in this VRF for IPv4 traffic. It overrides VRF level mpls-exp value. Reset BGP Peering to take this value in effect

redistribute.description: Protocol type to redistribute into BGP

mplsExp.description: MPLS experimental bits value to be carried in this VRF for IPv4 traffic. It overrides VRF level mpls-exp value. Reset BGP Peering to take this value in effect

redistribute.description: Protocol type to redistribute into BGP

destination.description: IP address of the route destination

length.description: IP prefix length of the route destination

tag.description: Tag Value for making Policy Decision

BfdParams.description: BFD parameters to be used for Single-Hop BFD sessions under this context

name.description: BFD Profile name - type is <alphanumeric, '_' is allowed>

txInterval.description: Transmit interval in milliseconds in the range [100 .. 4294967].

rxInterval.description: Minimum receive interval in milliseconds in the range [100 .. 4294967].

multiplier.description: The hello multiplier value in the range [1 .. 255].

name.description: Ipv4 Prefix list name - type is <alphanumeric

line.description: Ipv4 prefix list entry; sequence number <1-2147483647>, action, ipv4 address, le and ge ranges <1..32>

address.description: Configure the ip of the prefix

lessThanOrEqual.description: lessThanOrEqual range type <0..32> (Value must be greater than prefix-length ).  If both le and ge are specified, must (lessThanOrEqual > greaterThanOrEqual)

greaterThanOrEqual.description: greaterThanOrEqual range type <0..32> (Value must be greater than prefix-length ).  If both le and ge are specified, must (lessThanOrEqual > greaterThanOrEqual)

name.description: Ipv6 Prefix list name - type is <alphanumeric

line.description: Ipv6 prefix list entry; sequence number <1-2147483647>, action, ipv6 address, le and ge ranges <1..128>

address.description: Configure the ip of the prefix

lessThanOrEqual.description: lessThanOrEqual range type <0..128> (Value must be greater than prefix-length ).  If both le and ge are specified, must (lessThanOrEqual > greaterThanOrEqual)

greaterThanOrEqual.description: greaterThanOrEqual range type <0..128> (Value must be greater than prefix-length ).  If both le and ge are specified, must (lessThanOrEqual > greaterThanOrEqual)

communityList.description: Configure a Community List <1-99> to match BGP Standard Community Attributes

line.description: Community List Entry <1-99>: community num | AN:NN | local-AS | no-advertise | no-export, action

expression.description: <1-4294967295>  community number; aa:nn           community number; internet        Internet (well-known community); local-AS        Do not send outside local AS (well-known community); no-advertise    Do not advertise to any peer (well-known community); no-export       Do not export to next AS (well-known community)

extendedCommunityList.description: Configure an Extended Community List <100-199> to match BGP Extended Community Attributes

line.description: Extended Community List Entry <100-199>: action, regular expression

communityListWord.description: Configure a named Community List to match BGP Standard Community Attributes

line.description: Community List Entry <WORD>: community num | AN:NN | local-AS | no-advertise | no-export, action

expression.description: <1-4294967295>  community number; internet        Internet (well-known community);local-AS        Do not send outside local AS (well-known community);no-advertise    Do not advertise to any peer (well-known community);no-export       Do not export to next AS (well-known community)

extendedCommunityListWord.description: Configure a Named Extended Community List <WORD> to match BGP Extended Community Attributes

line.description: Extended Community List Entry <WORD>: action, regular expression

continueRouteMapMatchRules.description: Enable/continue matching all route-map match rules (significant when >1 match rules present)

matchTable.description: Defines the match clauses for this route map entry

matchIpPrefixList.description: Name of provisioned Ipv4 Prefix list.  This should match an IPv4 prefix list provisioned under policy

matchIpv6PrefixList.description: Name of provisioned Ipv6 Prefix list.  This should match an IPv6 prefix list provisioned under policy

matchIpNextHop.description: Match ipv4 address of next hop (Only applicable to route map in)

matchIpV6NextHop.description: Match ipv6 address of next hop (Only applicable to route map in)

setTable.description: Defines the set clauses for this route map entry

setIpNextHop.description: Set ipv4 address of next hop

setIpv6NextHop.description: Set ipv6 address of next hop

setVpnNextHop.description: Set the next hop address for vpnv4 routes

setLocalPreference.description: Set BGP local preference path attribute

numberAltFormat.description: aa:nn;;community number in aa:nn format. Up to 5. If multiple community numbers are to be specified they must be separated by a space and quoted, e.g. '100:200 300:400'

routeTarget.description: Regular Expression for route target AA:NN

sightOfOrigin.description: Regular Expression for sight of origin AA:NN

setTag.description: Set tag value for destination routing protocol

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

networkContext.description: List of Network Contexts in the Routing resource.

items.description: Configure the Network Contexts supported by the associated network functions. Each Network Context represents an entire IPv4 address space and an entire IPv6 address space. The address spaces of all Network Contexts are disjoint

name.description: Network Context name - type is <alphanumeric, '_' is allowed>

isVirtualRoutingFunction.description: Whether this network context represents a Virtual Routing Function or not

virtualRoutingFunctionNames.description: Configure and manage Virtual Routing Functions to associate to virtual router.  Only applicable if virtualRoutingFunction = false.

networkContextName.description: Network Context name - type is <alphanumeric, '_' is allowed>.  Points to provisioned network context that has virtualRoutingFunction = true

enableStaticAll.description: Enable BFD sessions for all IPv4/IPv6 static routes in this context

singleHopBfdProfile.description: BFD profile to be used for Single-Hop BFD sessions under this context, if not configured default timers (tx-interval = 300, rx-interval = 300, multiplier = 3) will be used

policy.description: Routing policy configuration.  These are applied when referenced

value.description: A list of Routing resources in a Mobile Packet Core.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

RoutingListResult.description: Response for Mobile Packet Core Routing API service call.
